subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Luge Racing
Olympic Games (2014)
Ski Jumping
Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: Chris Mazdzer wrapped up a spot on the 2014 United States Olympic luge team with a fourth-place finish on Saturday in a World Cup race at Igls, Austria.
snippet: Chris Mazdzer wrapped up a spot on the 2014 United States Olympic luge team with a fourth-place finish on Saturday in a World Cup race at Igls, Austria.
